description: Database for managing cloud service products, hosting plans, domain products, and marketing content.

sections.label: products Summary
fields: OAuth 2.0-based login system supporting providers like Google,LinkedIn, SMS OTP, and Email OTP.
A powerful unified payment gateway aggregator. Supports UPI, PhonePe, CCAvenue & more.
Multi-channel messaging for transactional & promotional messages via SMS, WhatsApp, Email & more.
Centralised, scalable API layer built for speed & reliability to integrate any service into your applications.
